name: attribute-curator
label: Attribute Curator
description: Curation of derived data for MQT project
author: NACC

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

filename_patterns.description: Filename patterns to match on; comma-deliminated for multiple patterns

curation_tag.description: Tag to apply to curated files

force_curate.description: Curate file even if it's already been curated

max_num_workers.description: Max number of workers to use

debug.description: Whether or not to use debug-level logging (level set to DEBUG)

rxclass_concepts_s3_uri.description: S3 URI to pull RxClass concepts JSON from. If provided, skips the RxClass querying at the beginning of curation and uses the data provided here

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter gearbot path prefix
